body.name: 2.4GHz Wireless Gaming Headset for PS5, PC, PS4, Mac, Nintendo Switch, Bluetooth 5.2 Gaming Headphones with Microphone for Computer, Mobile, Stereo Sound, 3.5MM Wired Mode for Xbox Series(Camo)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 35 mins
features: 🎧 Stable Connection & Stereo Sound: Gtheos Captain 300 wireless gaming headset combines high performance 2.4GHz lossless wireless technology for the accessible connection up to 49 feet in an unobstructed space. Lower latency (≤20ms) and featuring 50mm driver with 30% extra sound effect ensure that the wireless gaming headphones provide higher quality stereo sound, which makes you sense voice of directions, footsteps and every details clearly in games for a better immersive gaming experience.

🎧 Detachable Omni-directional Noise-reduction Microphone: Captain 300 wireless ps5 headset with microphone for pc combines detachable, flexible, sensible and omni-directional microphone, providing high-end noise cancellation, which not only can be adjusted to the angles you want, also enables you to chat with your teammates with crystal clarity dialogue by this bluetooth gaming headset to coordinate with every scene of your game.

🎧 3-in-1 Connection Ways & Multi-platform Compatibility: Captain 300 pc gaming headset supports low latency, lossless 2.4GHz USB dongle and the latest Bluetooth 5.2 stable connection, while supporting 3.5mm wired connection mode. Unique 3 in 1 connection design (equipped with both USB dongle and 3.5mm jack cable) make this gaming headset widely compatible with PS5, PS4 controller, PC, Mac, phone, pad, Switch(Invalid Microphone); Xbox series only compatible with 3.5mm wired mode.

🎧 Ergonomic Design & Long-lasting Battery Life: Gtheos wireless headset for switch design padded adjustable headbands not only good for reducing head pressure but also suitable for various head shapes. Ears are completely covered by soft and breathable memory-protein earmuffs that isolate noises effectively and allow for long gaming sessions without fatigue. PS5 gaming headset has a sustainable game time of 35-40Hrs. With cool RGB lighting effect turned on(15-20Hrs). Full-recharge in just 3Hrs.

🎧 Stylish Camouflage Surface Design & Professional Services: Gtheos ps5 headset is made of high-quality and durable materials. With stylish camouflage surface design, after detaching the microphone, it is not only an exquisite wireless headset, but also a suitable multi-scene (subway, home, going out) bluetooth gaming headphone. Meantime, we have experienced engineers and professional support team work on our wireless pc headset to provide comprehensive help for each customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Probably one of the best price for performance headsets you can buy.
reviews.reviewText: You're always taking a risk when you buy a budget headset but this one is worth it.Purchased on sale for $32 and it has exceeding my expectations.Sound quality is very good, but worth noting it is slightly on the bass heavier side. Might be a positive for some a negative for others but it isn't overpowering.Microphone quality is acceptable. You will sound as if you are talking through a headset, but no clarity or volume issues. If you require a microphone for hosting calls, streaming, etc. this one might not fit your needs. I would have liked to see them include a foam cover for mic, as it is a dirt cheap accessory that can drastically add value to any microphone. Noise canceling seems to be average at best.Completely plug and play. No drivers or downloads necessary. USB wireless, 3.5mm, Bluetooth. PC, Phone, Car. Using the 2.4ghz wireless I was still able to hear my audio several rooms away, approximately 45 feet. Microphone transmission had minor hiccups at that range.The fit is very snug, but not uncomfortable. Most background noise will be suppressed when wearing the headset due to the design. Ear and head padding is adequate.Only potential issues I see are the height adjustments or overall tension becoming too lose or stretched too quickly over time. There is no tension strap feature above, and it relies solely on the top padding and innate snugness to rest on your head.Can not give an accurate assessment of battery life at this time but the charge it shipped with lasted at least 12 hours before giving an audio low battery notification.Headset still works while charging and as I am writing this review.My only negatives so far outside of the the minor improvements and suggestions I listed above would be:-Battery level indication upon powering the headset. Just a voice indicating high/medium/low level.-Mute and Lighting settings being persistent and not resetting after powering off.Overall this headset has already outperformed others that are double or even triple the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just get them
reviews.reviewText: These are good headphones, for the price I'm more than satisfied. Just got a new pc and I wanted our first headset to be on point without breaking the bank. This checked all my boxes. I'm not much of a mic user for gaming so I haven't used it in that aspect. Purely on sound though these are the ones, if you're on the edge about these I'm here to tell u to do it. Nice bass. Nice volume. Easy on the eyes, ours lights up a soft blue and looks dope at night. Comes with a Bluetooth USB which connects easy and headphone jack. A product has to blow me away for me to come on here and write a post. Gonna circle back to these going forward. Rock on yall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've had this headset since Oct. 2023. I love it. They are comfortable and the sound is great for my needs. I bought this to use with my PS5. You will not be able to connect via Bluetooth. Not compatible with PS5, but the attached flash drive that you can insert into PS5 allows it to connect wirelessly. There is no lag in connection. The battery of headset lasts a long time before needing to charge. I'm overall satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Very Surprised
reviews.reviewText: These headphones are actually very good. Love the option of using the 3.5mm or wireless option. The moment I put them on, my party that I was in was like, you sound great. They are very loud, almost too loud, but there is a volume control. I was concerned about the sound cues in siege but they sounded pretty clear as I could tell what direction foot steps were coming from.They are a bit more solid that I expected and have some weight to them when you pick them up and feel comfortable on my head which is large, lol.The wireless feature does have some issues as I could hear some crackling and sounds breaking up as if I was lagging, but it comes and goes on the PS4. Overall very pleased with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s an amazingly built headset!
reviews.reviewText: Get this headset! It’s Bluetooth, easy to connect, allows pc connection! I got this cause I was tired of my earbuds falling out but also didn’t want a wired headset like my old one that broke… so I got this cause it was within my price range and thought “why not.” So I got it next day and it was a life changer, it’s not 100% noise canceling but like 85% I can hear sounds around me but can’t make out conversations. If I have the volume on then forget about talking to me, I can’t hear anything at all! 1000/10 would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m impressed, night and day compared to my old headset!!
reviews.reviewText: I got this to replace my old headset since the right ear broke because of faulty material. This headset I’ve had for about a month and so far it’s as good as new still! I am very gentle with taking it off my head and at first the headset was tight on my head so I had to stretch it at first for it to fit. Over the next week or so the headset adjusted to my head and now I feel no tightness. The ear cushions are really soft and comfy for me even after hours of wear. The detachable mic is really clear for me when I talk with friends, I don’t hear complaints of background noise from them. The headset has a lady that will announce when it’s on, off, pairing, connected, and if mic is muted or not. This announcement will temporarily cut off sound while she speaks. I like that the headset auto pairs to my computer when I turn it on and I don’t have to repair it. Another bonus is that you can use the headset while you are charging it. I find that I use the headset mostly with the light off since it saves battery life and I can use it for multiple days before it needs to be recharged. Normally at around 10-20% it’ll start telling you the battery is low but the alert is short and not too distracting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for the Money
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my 10 year old son as, at his age, I don’t think a $150+ headset is warranted yet for the sake of the possibility of it breaking. This headset is comfortable to wear for multiple hours, super easy to install, the sound is great and the microphone works well too. All around, so far, I’m very happy with this product. The noise cancellation is not the best but certainly not the worst as well (comparing to Apple noise cancelling AirPods). It’s good enough for gaming.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente opción para la consola ps5
reviews.reviewText: Buena calidad en el sonido, lo importante es que pude conectarlos a la consola sin ningún problema. Buena alternativa en relación al precio tmb.

Muy buen artículo, lo utilizo para llamadas de trabajo, se escucha muy bien y me escuchan bien los demás en la llamada. El único inconveniente es el peso, después de llamadas muy largas me queda un poco adolorida la cabeza, pero en general me parece muy buena compra, precio-calidad muy bien.

i like that the mic is removable, and that the light can be turned off. overall decent headset, not top of the line but good for the price. mic quality is decent and battery life is good, i can go days without charging it.

Amazing headset! Sound quality is great and speech is as good as I've ever had it. They charge relatively quickly and the battery lasts hours and hours without any noticeable drop in quality. I'm pretty shocked at the superb quality for the good price I didn't expect to get anything nearly this good. Works corded and with Bluetooth. Thank you!P.S. the microphone is detachable which is amazing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good sound quality, decent comfort, meh quality control
reviews.reviewText: Update: adding a star simply because the seller got in contact within a day of my review going live, and offered a full refund. While the quality control does seem a little hit or miss, the company at least seems to be prioritizing the customer when it comes to any defective hardware you may receive.Sound quality is good, the top volume is kind of ridiculously loud so it's best to keep it around half volume for most content. Haven't had any trouble connecting via Bluetooth. Wired connection automatically turns off the wireless functions so you don't have to worry about it using up battery. They're a little bulky, so they get uncomfortable around the ears after a few hours. The USB adapter is completely broken, will not connect even with the headset in adapter mode, and the dongle heats up a lot while plugged in to the PC, to the point where the little metal button is scalding. Would prefer to be able to switch from the voice feedback for connecting etc. to chimes or something, just personal preference. Either way, it does most of what I was expecting it to do, but there are improvements to be made.
